data.title: What is your review of Salò, Or The 120 Days Of Sodom (1975 movie)?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 3): I've seen a lot of movies in my life but this is not only the absolute worst movie I've ever had the misfortune of seeing but also the most heinous.  I saw it in the 1970s and I'm still traumatized. As with the smallpox virus, one has to wonder if we all wouldn't be better off if...
